alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 5:15PM CDT until July 06 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northwestern Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 514 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Booker, or 13 miles east of Perryton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Beaver, Booker, Forgan, Darrouzett, Gate, Knowles, Elmwood, Mocane, Slapout and Balko. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
